| History                 = Following the televised debut of a new version of the [[Avengers West Coast (Earth-616)|West Coast Avengers]], [[Giuletta Nefaria (Earth-616)|Madame Masque]] organized a new iteration of the Masters of Evil from various resident super-villains in Los Angeles such as [[Franklin Hall (Earth-616)|Graviton]], [[Satana Hellstrom (Earth-616)|Satana Hellstrom]], [[Edward Lavell (Earth-616)|Eel]], and [[Maki Matsumoto (Earth-616)|Lady Bullseye]]. This iteration of the Masters of Evil was formed with the goal of breaking up the new West Coast Avengers team, recruiting [[M.O.D.O.K. Superior (Earth-616)|M.O.D.O.K]], who had recently been defeated by the West Coast Avengers, alongside [[Eleanor Bishop (Earth-616)|Eleanor Bishop]] and [[Derek Bishop (Earth-616)|Derek Bishop]], the parents of the team's leader [[Katherine Bishop (Earth-616)|Hawkeye]]. The group lured the Avengers to an abandoned carnival to torture the team, but were thwarted and released after [[Noh-Varr (Earth-200080)|Noh-Varr]] was revealed to have been disguised as Graviton, and Hawkeye broke the power inhibitors M.O.D.O.K had placed on her teammates.{{r|West Coast Avengers Vol 3 6}}
